items.name: Nebulis

19% increased Cold Damage per 1% Cold Resistance above 75%

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that deals damage.

Supported Skills deal no Chaos Damage
Supported Skills deal no Elemental Damage

properties.name: Spell, Movement, Duration, Fire, Travel, Blink

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.
explicitMods: Base duration is 12.00 seconds
Gains a Stage when you Spend a total of 400 Mana while in Area
Enemies in Area deal 19% less Damage while at maximum Stages
Maximum 4 Stages
Buff grants 7 to 141 Added Lightning Damage per Stage
Minimum 1 second between Stages
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Marylene's Fallacy
explicitMods: +108 to Accuracy Rating
+237% to Global Critical Strike Multiplier
+96 to Evasion Rating

40% less Critical Strike Chance

flavourText: "Marylene stroked the medallion at her breast
before every duel and every cast of the die."
- Victario, the People's Poet

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +24 to Intelligence
30% increased Lightning Damage

items.name: Coward's Legacy
explicitMods: +15 to all Attributes
10% increased Movement Speed
50% increased Effect of Curses on you
You count as on Low Life while you are Cursed with Vulnerability
You are Cursed with Vulnerability
flavourText: Death is your most important duty.
Face it, or curse your bloodline for all eternity.

items.name: Eber's Unification
explicitMods: Trigger Level 10 Void Gaze when you use a Skill
179% increased Energy Shield
+72 to maximum Mana
50% increased Stun and Block Recovery
Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
flavourText: The impediments of flesh are weak.
The air we breathe knows no such boundaries.
I exhale, and you inhale,
and inexorably we inch towards oneness.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Create a Tornado that hinders and repeatedly damages enemies around it. It will move forward for a duration, during which your projectiles can collide with it to deal damage as though it was an enemy. Then it will chase down enemies for a secondary duration, and reflect a portion of the damage it took from your projectiles to them in addition to its own damage.
explicitMods: Deals 88 to 133 Physical Damage
Deals Damage every 0.25 seconds
Base duration is 1.50 seconds
Base secondary duration is 4.00 seconds
During initial Duration, can be hit by your Projectiles up to 20 times
Reflects 10% of Damage Taken to Enemies
Maximum 1 Tornado
Tornado has 21% increased Movement Speed

You gain +0.38% to Spell Critical Strike Chance per Stage while in Area
